mapper.sql: SID, PIN, USER_NAME_CN, USER_NAME_EN, USER_NAME_VN, USER_STATE, COUNTRY, SEX, PASSWORD, EMAIL, EXT_TEL, PHONE1, PHONE2, GROUP_ID, SHIFT_ID, PWD_MODIFY_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, VERSION, SHORT_NAME, BRANCH_COMPANY_ID, WORKSHOP_ID, DEPT_CODE, STAFF_SID, ORG_SID
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SU_USER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into SGAI_SU_USER (SID, PIN, USER_NAME_CN, USER_NAME_EN, USER_NAME_VN, USER_STATE, COUNTRY, SEX, PASSWORD, EMAIL, EXT_TEL, PHONE1, PHONE2, GROUP_ID, SHIFT_ID, PWD_MODIFY_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, VERSION, SHORT_NAME, BRANCH_COMPANY_ID, WORKSHOP_ID, DEPT_CODE, STAFF_SID, ORG_SID ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNameVn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{country,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shiftId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pwdModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workshopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffSid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgSid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

SELECT SEQ_SU_USER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
